channel.title: How do i change standard hp lvl?
channel.description:
hey, im trying to change the standard hp lvl in my server, from 14 to 10. so when a char first logs in, it will be 10 instead of 14.
also : when i try to make someone his hp lvl 1, i got to his char files, change his lvl to 1, and exp to 0, for hp. how comes it still says hp lvl 1/14 when u log in?
any help is welcome, plz!
thanks

item.title: How do i change standard hp lvl?
item.dc:creator: @darkrounge darkrounge
item.description:
@darkrounge wrote:

[quote=“x pk3r xx, post:1, topic:238503”]also : when i try to make someone his hp lvl 1, i got to his char files, change his lvl to 1, and exp to 0, for hp. how comes it still says hp lvl 1/14 when u log in?

you need to compile it lol

thanks[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: How do i change standard hp lvl?
item.dc:creator: @x_pk3r_xx x pk3r xx
item.description:
@x_pk3r_xx wrote:

i changed the exp’s to 600, and the standard lvl is now 10.
thank you very much!

it allready is… -.- standard hp still 14

in the player class
Find the same thing and change the level to 10 and exp to 950.

item.title: How do i change standard hp lvl?
item.dc:creator: @_x11 ® ×
item.description:
@_x11 wrote:

Then… open up: Client.java and search for:

playerXP[3] =

Change number after = to 1155.
Then search for:

playerLevel[i] =

Change it to:

playerLevel[i] = 10; playerXP[i] = 1155;

Read full topic

item.title: How do i change standard hp lvl?
item.dc:creator: @_x11 ® ×
item.description:
@_x11 wrote:

Open up Player.java
1: Search for:

playerXP[i] =

2: Change the number after = to:

1155;
playerXP[i] = 1155;
